item.description:
For Korean BBQ BUFFET

For those who don't like to get shot but still want to eat some good KBBQ, come out and join us at New Seoul Korean BBQ Buffet at 5pm.

Please RSVP and indicate BBQ only so I know who's coming. $25/person

http://www.yelp.com/biz/new-seoul-bbq-buffet-canton

100 Washington St. Canton, MA 02021. ﻿

For Paintball Folks:

Wear multiple layers and old comfortable shoes!  Leave your blings at home!  Bring your own gear if you have them.

Please be at the registration area at 12:15pm to sign the waiver.

$35/person: includes gear, mask, and 200 balls

$15/person: if you have your own gear, and 500 balls.

Check out their website:

http://www.randolphpaintball.com/prices.html

 

We had a good turn out at the indoor paintball event last time.  I hope to see those familiar faces and meeting new folks as well.

When you RSVP, please indicate if you need a ride or can provide a ride.  

Cheers,

Tran
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a bunch of confused Asians. JK...just look for myself or Alex at the registration area.
item.why: Who's ready for some outdoor fun this weekend with shooting some folks in the woods? Lets head out to outdoor paintball since the weather is perfect right now!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Outdoor Paintball !!! and/or Korean BBQ Buffet!!
